mapper.select: SELECT TENANT_ID AS tenantId , ENTER_CD AS enterCd , ORG_CD AS orgCd , ORG_NM AS orgNm , SYMD AS symd , EYMD AS eymd , ORG_TYPE AS orgType , NOTE AS note FROM WTM_ORG_CODE WHERE TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND ENTER_CD = #{enterCd} AND (ORG_CD LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') OR ORG_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')) AND CASE WHEN #{sYmd} = '' THEN date_format(now(),'%Y%m%d') ELSE REPLACE(#{sYmd}, '-', '') END BETWEEN SYMD AND EYMD
